Kullanƒ±m: - POST /api/luca-invoices/pdf-link - Fatura PDF linki al - POST /api/luca-invoices/list - Fatura listesi - POST /api/luca-invoices/list-currency - D√∂vizli fatura listesi - POST /api/luca-invoices/create - Yeni fatura olu≈ütur - POST /api/luca-invoices/close - Fatura kapat/√∂deme - DELETE /api/luca-invoices/{invoiceId} - Fatura sil - POST /api/luca-invoices/send - Fatura g√∂nder (E-Fatura/E-Ar≈üiv)

member.name: M:Katana.API.Controllers.SyncController.SendSalesInvoiceToLuca(Katana.Core.DTOs.LucaCreateInvoiceHeaderRequest)
member.summary: ‚úÖ Luca'ya satƒ±≈ü faturasƒ± g√∂nder (SADECE Admin) Luca'daki stok kartlarƒ±nƒ± kullanarak fatura olu≈üturur

member.name: M:Katana.API.Controllers.SyncController.SyncSalesOrdersFromKatana(System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary:
‚úÖ Katana'dan satƒ±≈ü sipari≈ülerini manuel senkronize et (SADECE Admin) Background worker'ƒ± beklemeden anƒ±nda sipari≈üleri √ßeker
END-TO-END SYNC FLOW: 1. Fetch orders from Katana API (GetSalesOrdersBatchedAsync) - fromDate=null ‚Üí status=NOT_SHIPPED (open orders only) - fromDate provided ‚Üí created_at_min filter (all statuses)
2. For each order (SalesOrderDto): a. Customer Mapping: Katana customer ID ‚Üí Local customer ID b. If customer not found: Fetch from Katana API and create locally c. Create SalesOrder entity with: - CustomerId = local database ID (NOT Katana ID) - Status = raw Katana status string (NOT mapped to enum) - All other fields from Katana DTO d. Create SalesOrderLine entities for each row e. Save to database
3. Create PendingStockAdjustment for admin approval (open orders only)
NOTE: This does NOT use KatanaApiClient.GetSalesOrdersAsync (legacy method). It directly uses IKatanaService.GetSalesOrdersBatchedAsync for better control.

member.name: M:Katana.API.Controllers.SyncController.DebugKatanaOrder(System.String)
member.summary: üîç DEBUG: Katana sipari≈üini hem API'den hem veritabanƒ±ndan √ßekip kar≈üƒ±la≈ütƒ±r Kullanƒ±m: GET /api/sync/debug/katana-order/SO-56

member.name: T:Katana.API.Workers.KatanaSalesOrderSyncWorker
member.summary:
Background service that periodically syncs sales orders from Katana API and creates pending stock adjustments for admin approval.
SYNC FLOW (runs every 5 minutes): 1. Fetch ONLY open orders from Katana (status=NOT_SHIPPED) - Uses GetSalesOrdersBatchedAsync with fromDate=null - This ensures old orders like SO-41, SO-47 are included
2. For each order (SalesOrderDto): a. Customer Mapping: Resolve Katana customer ID to local database ID b. If customer not found: Fetch from Katana and create locally c. Create SalesOrder entity: - CustomerId = local database ID (1, 2, 3...) NOT Katana ID (91190794...) - Status = raw Katana status ("NOT_SHIPPED", "OPEN", etc.) - All fields mapped from Katana DTO d. Create SalesOrderLine entities with variant mapping e. Save to database (duplicate prevention via KatanaOrderId)
3. Create PendingStockAdjustment for admin approval - Only for open orders (skips cancelled/shipped/delivered) - Duplicate prevention via composite key (OrderId|SKU|Quantity)
4. Trigger downstream syncs: - Sync products to Luca (stock cards) - Sync approved orders to Luca (invoices) - Create notification for new orders
NOTE: Does NOT use KatanaApiClient.GetSalesOrdersAsync (legacy). Directly uses IKatanaService.GetSalesOrdersBatchedAsync.

member.name: T:Katana.API.Workers.LucaBatchPushWorker
member.summary: Luca'ya toplu √ºr√ºn g√∂nderimi yapan background worker. Batch job queue'dan i≈üleri alƒ±r ve arka planda paralel olarak i≈üler. - MaxDegreeOfParallelism: 10 (Luca API'yi yormadan optimum hƒ±z) - SemaphoreSlim ile kontroll√º paralel i≈ülem - SignalR ile ger√ßek zamanlƒ± ilerleme bildirimi

member.name: F:Katana.API.Workers.LucaBatchPushWorker.MaxParallelism
member.summary: Maksimum paralel istek sayƒ±sƒ± - Luca API'yi yormadan optimum deƒüer

member.name: F:Katana.API.Workers.LucaBatchPushWorker.ParallelThreshold
member.summary: Paralel i≈ülem i√ßin minimum √ºr√ºn e≈üiƒüi Bu sayƒ±nƒ±n altƒ±ndaki √ºr√ºnler sƒ±ralƒ± i≈ülenir (daha verimli)

member.name: F:Katana.API.Workers.LucaBatchPushWorker.ProgressNotifyInterval
member.summary: ƒ∞lerleme bildirimi g√∂nderme aralƒ±ƒüƒ± (her X √ºr√ºnde bir)

member.name: M:Katana.API.Workers.LucaBatchPushWorker.ProcessBatchJobSequentialAsync(Katana.Core.DTOs.BatchJobItem,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: K√º√ß√ºk job'lar i√ßin sƒ±ralƒ± i≈ülem (50'den az √ºr√ºn). Daha az overhead, daha basit.

member.name: M:Katana.API.Workers.LucaBatchPushWorker.ProcessBatchJobParallelAsync(Katana.Core.DTOs.BatchJobItem,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: B√ºy√ºk job'lar i√ßin paralel i≈ülem (50+ √ºr√ºn). SemaphoreSlim ile maksimum 10 e≈ü zamanlƒ± istek yapƒ±lƒ±r.

member.summary: Luca stok kartƒ± cache'ini periyodik olarak yeniler. Basit, hafif bir BackgroundService (Quartz yok).
